channel.title: [F2P]RSCLite
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]Welcome to [url=http://www.rsclite.info]RSCLite[/url][/size]
[url=http://www.rsclite.info]RSCLite[/url] is a F2P related [url=http://www.rsclite.info]Private Server[/url], meaning 99% of the content is F2P only, including skills, wilderness and items, along with access to all members related areas.
[url=http://www.rsclite.info]RSCLite[/url] has a lot of custom features added such as the stats changer for combat related stats only, party system to chat with friends, flag system and much more, you can find more details below.
[b][size=12pt]Details & Information:[/size][/b] Nice experience rated server which customs of gaining extra [url=http://www.rsclite.info]Runescape Classic[/url] like drops/and rates Fishing batched by levels of 10(example 20 - twice, 30 - three) times Level requirements added to woodcut/pickaxes Custom training places [url=http://www.rsclite.info]Runescape Classic F2P[/url] like with custom features Experience points gained for combat related stats Change you're combat related stats using the stats changer Big client Toggle-able dueling, disbaled by default More experience in wilderness level over 10 More experience for Subscribers Chance of 2x drops in wilderness for Subscribers Default AFK timer of 15minutes, 30minutes for Subscribers Stats changer updated to work better with low level accounts.
For more information about updates please check our website.
[b]Party System[/b] We have a Party system that allows friends / nearby players to train together & gain more experience between each other, as well as using it to chat and keep track of party members in wilderness. This also allows you to keep track of your party members HP percentage which is the red bar on the party bar along with displaying their level and flag.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/18/screenshot7uo.png/][IMG]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/175/screenshot7uo.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Flags System[/b] Here at [url=http://www.rsclite.info]RSCLite[/url] we have a Country Flag system with over 300 flags to choose from, let everyone know the country your from!
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/43/screenshot6fp.png/][IMG]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/3184/screenshot6fp.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Player Information[/b] You can right click a player > Info a player and check out details about their character. People can also hide their combat stats from others.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YQP0P.png[/img]
[b]Tools Tab & Stats Changer[/b] Within the tools tab you can do various things such as change stats, toggle party bar and much more.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/252/toolstab.png/][IMG]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/3885/toolstab.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Runescape Classic like ranging[/b] Which means ranging through walls is now not possible.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/10/screenshot1tel.png/][IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/2465/screenshot1tel.png[/img][/URL]
[b]New Sprites[/b]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/705/screenshot2hi.png/][IMG]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/1417/screenshot2hi.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Updated Sleep system[/b]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/839/sleepk.png/][IMG]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/7659/sleepk.png[/img][/URL]
[b]New training places[/b]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/696/screenshot4vs.png/][IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/936/screenshot4vs.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Three times attackable npc's in wilderness[/b]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/35/screenshot3hb.png/][IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/2116/screenshot3hb.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Runescape Classic like Champions guild[/b] The Champions guild [i]does not[/i] work the same way as Runescape Classic as we do not have quest's as of now, although it can be accessed with other requirements to find out more check us out: [url=http://www.rsclite.info]RSCLite[/url]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/269/champsguild.png/][IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/5481/champsguild.png[/img][/URL]
[size=12pt][b]How To Get Started:[/size] 1 - [url=http://www.rsclite.info/index.php?action=register]Register[/url] 2 - Download the Client from the client section on the [url=http://www.rsclite.info]website[/url] 3 - Extract the client with winrar or similar, double click the .bat file 4 - Enter an account name and password what is not taken 5 - Talk to the Game-Instructor in lumbridge if you need help
[size=12pt][b][url=http://www.rsclite.info]RSCLite Information[/url][/b][/size] [url=http://www.rsclite.info/index.php?action=register]Register[/url] [url=http://www.rsclite.info/index.php?action=login]Login[/url] [url=http://www.rsclite.info/index.php?action=forum]Forum[/url] [url=http://www.rsclite.info/index.php?board=10.0]Support/Help[/url] [url=http://www.rsclite.info/index.php?page=commands]Commands[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/w724704bg7tq/RSCLite.rar]RSCLite Client[/url]
[url=http://www.rsclite.info]Join in with the fun at RSCLite[/url]
[b]I understand the website is very slow at times, this will be fixed shortly. -Note: You do not need to register via the website to play in game.[/b]

item.title: [F2P]RSCLite
item.dc:creator: @Ben99 Ben99
item.description:
@Ben99 wrote:

Recent updates:

Banker at karamja
New Combat system
Batched Mining
Batched Cooking
Global chat for all
Fixed mining guild requirements
Fixed some npc’s not been aggressive
Tweaked Friends handling
Spirit Tree at lumbridge is now free

And more, come join in on the fun.

Oh did I also mention, it won’t take weeks or even months to get to the stats you want.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @wajte wajte
item.description:
@wajte wrote:

This message is what I get for trying to register:

Your IP is Banned Your IP address has been banned by our system for spamming. You can't post on any of our hosted forums.

Why?
The IP address 90.231.xxx.xxx. was banned on Aug 1, 2012 for spamming one of our forums.

This ban was generated manually by an SMFNEW Administrator. We checked what you were trying to post and it was flagged as inappropriate. We also verified that your IP address was associated with forum spam.

The reason for this specific ban:

Read full topic

item.title: [F2P]RSCLite
item.dc:creator: @Ben99 Ben99
item.description:
@Ben99 wrote:

[size=14pt][b]Welcome to RSCLite[/size]

RSCLite is a F2P related Private Server, meaning 99% of the content is F2P only, including skills, wilderness and items, along with access to all members related areas.

RSCLite has a lot of custom features added such as the stats changer for combat related stats only, party system to chat with friends, flag system and much more, you can find more details below.

[size=12pt]Details & Information:[/size]
Nice experience rated server which customs of gaining extra
Runescape Classic like drops/and rates
Fishing batched by levels of 10(example 20 - twice, 30 - three) times
Level requirements added to woodcut/pickaxes
Custom training places
Runescape Classic F2P like with custom features
Experience points gained for combat related stats
Change you’re combat related stats using the stats changer
Big client
Toggle-able dueling, disbaled by default
More experience in wilderness level over 10
More experience for Subscribers
Chance of 2x drops in wilderness for Subscribers
Default AFK timer of 15minutes, 30minutes for Subscribers
Stats changer updated to work better with low level accounts.

For more information about updates please check our website.

Party System
We have a Party system that allows friends / nearby players to train together & gain more experience between each other, as well as using it to chat and keep track of party members in wilderness.
This also allows you to keep track of your party members HP percentage which is the red bar on the party bar along with displaying their level and flag.

Flags System
Here at RSCLite we have a Country Flag system with over 300 flags to choose from, let everyone know the country your from!

Player Information
You can right click a player > Info a player and check out details about their character. People can also hide their combat stats from others.

Tools Tab & Stats Changer
Within the tools tab you can do various things such as change stats, toggle party bar and much more.

Runescape Classic like ranging
Which means ranging through walls is now not possible.

New Sprites

Updated Sleep system

New training places

Three times attackable npc’s in wilderness

Runescape Classic like Champions guild
The Champions guild does not work the same way as Runescape Classic as we do not have quest’s as of now, although it can be accessed with other requirements to find out more check us out: RSCLite

[size=12pt][b]How To Get Started:[/size]
1 - Register
2 - Download the Client from the client section on the website
3 - Extract the client with winrar or similar, double click the .bat file
4 - Enter an account name and password what is not taken
5 - Talk to the Game-Instructor in lumbridge if you need help

[size=12pt]RSCLite Information[/size]
Register
Login
Forum
Support/Help
Commands
RSCLite Client

Join in with the fun at RSCLite

I understand the website is very slow at times, this will be fixed shortly.
-Note: You do not need to register via the website to play in game.

Read full topic
